trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for all Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Compensators.
trans-unit.target: 表示所有 Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) 補償器的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: The user should extend from this object in order to write a custom transaction Compensator.
trans-unit.target: 使用者應該以撰寫自訂的交易補償器擴充從這個物件。

trans-unit.source: A Compensator must always have a public constructor; otherwise, the recovery engine cannot create it.
trans-unit.target: 補償器必須永遠有公用的建構函式。否則，復原引擎無法建立它。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Create a Compensating Resource Manager (CRM)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0a8a024b-0be1-4519-a659-076577278029).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 建立 Compensating Resource Manager (CRM)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0a8a024b-0be1-4519-a659-076577278029)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個類別。

trans-unit.source: This compensator is used by the following worker class.
trans-unit.target: 這個補償器會使用下列的背景工作類別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a client that exercises this compensator and worker.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會示範這個補償器和背景工作的用戶端。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.Compensator" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.Compensator" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The log record to be delivered.
trans-unit.target: 要傳送的記錄檔資料錄。

trans-unit.source: Delivers a log record to the Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Compensator during the abort phase.
trans-unit.target: 在中止階段期間傳送記錄檔資料錄至 Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) 補償器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the delivered record should be forgotten; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應該忘記已傳送的資料錄，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the implementation of this method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範這個方法的實作。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to begin abort phase; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要開始中止階段，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Compensator of the abort phase of the transaction completion, and the upcoming delivery of records.
trans-unit.target: 告知 Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) 補償器，關於交易完成的中止階段和資料錄即將傳送。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the implementation of this method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範這個方法的實作。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to begin commit phase; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要開始認可階段，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Compensator of the commit phase of the transaction completion and the upcoming delivery of records.
trans-unit.target: 告知 Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) 補償器，關於交易完成的認可階段和資料錄即將傳送。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the implementation of this method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範這個方法的實作。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Compensator of the prepare phase of the transaction completion and the upcoming delivery of records.
trans-unit.target: 告知 Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) 補償器，關於交易完成的準備階段和資料錄即將傳送。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the implementation of this method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範這個方法的實作。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value representing the Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.Clerk" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示 Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.Clerk" /> 物件的值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.Clerk" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.Clerk" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The log record to forward.
trans-unit.target: 要轉寄的記錄檔資料錄。

trans-unit.source: Delivers a log record in forward order during the commit phase.
trans-unit.target: 在認可階段依轉寄順序傳送記錄檔資料錄。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the delivered record should be forgotten; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應該忘記已傳送的資料錄，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the implementation of this method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範這個方法的實作。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Compensator that it has received all the log records available during the abort phase.
trans-unit.target: 告知 Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) 補償器，它在中止階段期間已經收到所有可用的記錄檔資料錄。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the implementation of this method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範這個方法的實作。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Compensator that it has delivered all the log records available during the commit phase.
trans-unit.target: 告知 Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) 補償器，它在認可階段期間已經傳送所有可用的記錄檔資料錄。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the implementation of this method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範這個方法的實作。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Compensator that it has had all the log records available during the prepare phase.
trans-unit.target: 告知 Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) 補償器，它在準備階段期間已經擁有所有可用的記錄檔資料錄。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if successful; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功即為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the implementation of this method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範這個方法的實作。

trans-unit.source: The log record to forward.
trans-unit.target: 要轉寄的記錄檔資料錄。

trans-unit.source: Delivers a log record in forward order during the prepare phase.
trans-unit.target: 在準備階段依轉寄順序傳送記錄檔資料錄。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the delivered record should be forgotten; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應該忘記已傳送的資料錄，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
